title: The news. It's happening. Every night. Stay on top of it with the Evening Briefing
text:
CLOSE

A helicopter flies past as the full moon rises behind the Statue of Liberty on May 18, 2019 in New York City. (Photo: JOHANNES EISELE, AFP/Getty Images)

Look, we need to brief you on something important: The news. It's happening. Every night. And we don't want you to miss a thing.

Introducing the Evening Briefing, an after-hours roundup of the latest USA TODAY stories you’ll want to know. It’s USA TODAY, brought to you tonight and every night. Just think of it as USA TONIGHT.

Subscribe to USA TODAY's Evening Briefing newsletter here.

What's inside? Late-breaking news to keep you informed. Investigative reporting that deserves your attention. And award-winning journalism you’ll want to talk about.

Let us tell you everything going on in the news, every evening, right in your inbox.

But wait, there’s more!!! Along with the Evening Briefing, we 10/10 recommend subscribing to these other newsletters from USA TODAY:

Oh, what was that? A little louder for the people in the back row?

SUBSCRIBE TO USA TODAY'S EVENING BRIEFING NEWSLETTER HERE.

Read or Share this story: https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/2019/06/14/subscribe-usa-todays-evening-briefing-newsletter/1441175001/
description: Introducing the Evening Briefing, an after-hours roundup of the latest USA TODAY stories.
